articles.title: Unprecedented Heat As El Nino Weather Pattern Hits Parts Of Asia - NDTV
articles.description: Asia remains in the grip of a blistering heat wave, chiming with predictions from climate scientists that 2023 could be the world's hottest year.
articles.content:
A worker handles a block of ice at a wet market during a heat wave in Bangkok
